MARIS GINA

Skin care in Japan

We offer highest quality hair removal services

Maris Gina specializes in delivering personalized and sophisticated beauty care, catering to discerning clients who value excellence. With services tailored to individual needs, we offer a premier salon experience that sets us apart in Japan.

SUGARING METHOD

Natural, organic, and irresistibly smooth.

Maris Gina provides AP Sugaring Hair Removal with the renowned Alexandria Professional brand, known globally for its unique and advanced approach to hair removal.
01

Sugaring

Maris gina sugaring hair removal or ap sugaring as we call it, uses 'alexandria professional (AP)' brand that is the leading brand for sugaring and well known internationally.

02

Waxing

Waxing offers a quick and efficient way to remove hair from the roots, covering large areas in a single motion for smooth, lasting results.

03

Laser

Our most recommended unique combination of sugaring and laser hair removal delivers exceptional results, durability, and effective hair reduction that you won’t find elsewhere.

04

Aftercare

Alexandria Professional's Full Circle of Skin Conditioning® program is a comprehensive skin care regimen designed to address and prevent ingrown hairs, improve skin texture, and promote long-term hair reduction.

The Full Circle of Skin Conditioning® program
